subject: Human Growth Hormone
United States Politics and Government
Baseball
Smoking and Tobacco
Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Two House Democrats urged Major League Baseball and the players union to test for human growth hormone and ban chewing tobacco by players in uniform and in public view.
snippet: Two House Democrats urged Major League Baseball and the players union to test for human growth hormone and ban chewing tobacco by players in uniform and in public view.
